block.comment: converts a string representation of a binary number to a decimal

event.arg: <blocks app="Snap! 4.0, http://snap.berkeley.edu" version="1" collabId="item_9_517"><block-definition s="label %'text' of size %'size'" type="command" category="pen" collabId="item_9_516"><comment x="0" y="0" w="90" collapsed="false" collabId="item_9_515">LABEL will stamp text on the stage at the given font size. The direction of the text is the direction the sprite is facing, and color will match the pen color.</comment><header collabId="item_9_514"/><code collabId="item_9_513"/><inputs collabId="item_9_512"><input type="%txt" collabId="item_9_511">Hello!</input><input type="%n" collabId="item_9_510">12</input></inputs><script collabId="item_9_509"><block s="doRun" collabId="item_9_508"><block s="reportJSFunction" collabId="item_9_507"><list collabId="item_9_506"><l collabId="item_9_505">text</l><l collabId="item_9_504">size</l></list><l collabId="item_9_503">var stage = this.parentThatIsA(StageMorph), context = stage.penTrails().getContext('2d'), rotation = radians(this.direction() - 90), trans = new Point( this.center().x - stage.left(), this.center().y - stage.top() ), isWarped = this.Warped, len, pos; if (isWarped) {endWarp(); } context.save(); context.font = size + 'px monospace'; context.textAlign = 'left'; context.textBaseline = 'alphabetic'; context.fillStyle = this.color.toString(); len = context.measureText(text).width; trans = trans.multiplyBy(1 / stage.scale); context.translate(trans.x, trans.y); context.rotate(rotation); context.fillText(text, 0, 0); context.translate(-trans.x, -trans.y); context.restore(); pos = new Point( len * Math.sin(radians(this.direction())), len * Math.cos(radians(this.direction()))); pos = pos.add(new Point(this.xPosition(), this.yPosition())); this.gotoXY(pos.x, pos.y, false); this.changed(); if (isWarped) {this.startWarp(); } stage.changed();</l></block><list collabId="item_9_502"><block var="text" collabId="item_9_501"/><block var="size" collabId="item_9_500"/></list></block></script></block-definition><block-definition
